name: 7 Minutes in Purgatory
bio: Seven Minutes in Purgatory is a comedy show produced by Ian Abramson and Matt Byrne.Â Standup comedians perform their material directly to a camera alone in a soundproof room while the audience watches on a screen in another room. "What's interesting about this experiment is that for the comics, each of their jokes are given equal weight since there are no laughs as far as the standup is concerned. This gives the comic full license to experiment. It's outrageous." - The Chicago Tribune
copy: What happens when you deny stand-up comedians the benefit of laughter? Ian Abramson, host of 7 Minutes in Purgatory, finds out when he puts comics alone in the back of a truck to do their act while the audience watches from a different room.
